mapper.select: SELECT supplier_product_id, supplier_id, product_id, price, discount_percentage, stock_quantity, product_status, updated_at, created_at FROM supplier_products;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier_products (supplier_product_id, supplier_id, product_id, price, discount_percentage, stock_quantity, product_status) VALUES (#{supplierProductId}, #{supplierId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{discountPercentage}, #{stockQuantity}, #{productStatus});
